## Database.close() method

Close the Database

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
close(): Promise<void>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;

## Remarks

Opal database factory listens for the closed method to be called to manage lifecycles of databases it's managing.
